name: Olivier Agogué
background: Olivier Agogué serves as Editorial Director, Planète+ at Planète+. Focus areas include Science, history, civilization, and environment. They are looking for science documentaries balancing rigor with accessibility, history with fresh perspectives, and environmental programming with a solutions-focused approach.
target_audience: Culturally engaged audiences in France and Europe
budget_parameters: Documentary: €150K–€300K per hour (co-productions); Specialist Factual: €180K–€350K per hour (co-productions)
current_calls: Reflect latest broadcaster priorities as outlined above; commissioner-specific interests included.
submission_process: Two-page treatment with premise and intellectual approach
Submit via Canal+ Group portal: www.canalplusgroupe.com/producteurs
additional_info: Commissioning cycles are ongoing, with submissions accepted year-round unless strand-specific. Increasing focus on distinctive voices and cross-platform reach. Emphasis on diverse voices on- and off-screen, and encouragement of sustainable production practices.
